item.title: Kharghar, Ulwe Residents Face 24-Hour Water Cut: Pipeline Repairs Underway

description.p: Residents of Kharghar, Ulwe, and Dronagiri will experience a 24-hour water supply disruption starting this Sunday, NMMC officials have announced. The shutdown, commencing at 10:00 AM on Sunday, June 9th, is due to urgent repairs on a major pipeline near the Hetawane Dam. Specifically, a faulty valve requires replacement to prevent further leakage and ensure consistent pressure across the region.
